title: What is this font?
content:
Can someone please help me work out this font name?

Much appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Unknown Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140812205539/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-12%20at%202.27.07%20PM.png) | 27.31 KB |
author: melmelmel26

comments.content:
This looks like some kind of ‘customized’ helvetica.

Cheers, Florian

<cite>Florin,</cite>

<cite>We're trying real hard not to answer the font identification requests posted to the wrong forum.</cite>

To the original Poster:

As the subtitle to the General Discussion forum clearly states, type ID requests are **NOT WELCOME**.

Use

[http://typophile.com/fontid](http://web.archive.org/web/20140812205539/http:/typophile.com/fontid "http://typophile.com/fontid")

Dear Charles,

I’m very sorry for this. Please apologize.

Cheers, Florian

Help! What is this font please?????

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140812205539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/New%20Version3_5758.jpg)
Sorry, I moved to different forum. Was in a rush.
